entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
